name: plume cell
desc: The plume_cell module is a subsetting module used to eliminate whole cells from the input mesh based on the nodal data of one or more nodes that comprise the cells.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Subset By
properties.desc: The Subset By control allows the user to chose which criteria to use for subsetting cells.

properties.name: N1
properties.desc: The N1 value may be passed in via the InputNumberVariable1 port and is usable by the expression

properties.name: N2
properties.desc: The N2 value may be passed in via the InputNumberVariable2 port and is usable by the expression

properties.name: Subset Expression
properties.desc: The Subset Expression is used to determine which node or cell to include in the output. All expressions should resolve to either a true or false for each node (if using a nodal subset) or cell (if using a cell subset). Refer to the Module Help which contains many examples of Subset Expressions and acceptable operators

properties.name: Nodal Subset Variables
properties.desc: The Variables to use to set the criteria when subsetting by nodal data.

properties.name: Expression Cells To Include
properties.desc: The Expression Cells To Include value allows the user to include a cell if all nodes in the cell match the expression criteria, or if any of the nodes in the cell match the expression criteria.

properties.name: Cell Subset Variables
properties.desc: The Variables to use to set the criteria when subsetting by cell data.
